inclusion.criterion: Thrice a week for more then
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Receiving HDF patients who had been treated for > 3 months
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: History of Gastrointestinal Disease(Active peptic ulcer, severe constipation or severe GI dysmotility)
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has been treated with corticosteroid and cyclophosphamides for Wegener's granulomatosis for 4 months. His Birmingham Vasculitis Activity Score (BVAS) is above 4.
